column4: pici:now everyhere is makeing me mad i ask how to install my card. but you guys keep on giveing websites.if you dont know just say NO.
your question is asked so many times that the website knows every possible way to install the card.
no, you didn't just ask. you were rude about it, which is probably why nobody cares to help you.
did you use the Restricted Drivers Manager?
